TopicTitle: After Docking And Reloading Scene From Tracking Station Via the KSC Screen Craft Teleports Partially Below the Surface Causing Explosions.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.1.0.21572
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

Below is Two test Saves:

  1. Bug occurs, though intermittently sometimes.
  2. Bug hasn't occurred when the save file has the rover already moving towards the other craft.

First Test Save:

Spoiler

Bug occurs, though intermittently sometimes.

Video Evidence:
https://youtu.be/bp42bsDIfZY (1 minute 8 Seconds. Option to use timestamps to skip loading screens)

Steps to Replicate:

  1. Load 0120SubGroundBugTestSave
  2. Load 0120SubGroundBugTestSave again (To counter 1st load issues)
  3. Undock by pressing 1
  4. Move rover forward out of range of the other docking port
  5. Reverse back into the docking port
  6. Press Escape and Choose KSC
  7. Choose Tracking Station
  8. Control Docked Craft

Save File:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/dw6nuc5kupjzee8/0120SubGroundBugTestSave.zip?dl=0

Second Test Save:

Spoiler

Loaded save having rover already moving towards the docking port.

Video Evidence:
https://youtu.be/z_dxXGMZ4j0 (52 Seconds. Option to use timestamps to skip loading screens)

Steps to Replicate:

  1. Load 0120MovingIntoDockTestSave
  2. Load 0120MovingIntoDockTestSave again (To counter 1st load issues)
  3. Wait for Docking
  4. Press Escape and Choose KSC
  5. Choose Tracking Station
  6. Control Docked Craft

Save File:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/rlrbngjxuxxcw43/0120MovingIntoDockTestSave.zip?dl=0

Craft File for Both Tests:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/oxlb30c0zi1jkji/DockingBUgTestCraft.zip?dl=0

Additional Information:

  • Sorry I couldn't figure out the actual main cause of the problem. I also didn't realize it was actually an intermittent issue until I was getting the bug report all ready.
  • Doesn't happen if going to the tracking station directly and avoiding the KSC Screen.
  • Loading from the main menu was a precaution. Should be able to load the saves as many times as needed until it happens.

Thanks go to Corruptedreign7 on discord for giving me his bugged creation.

 

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
